column6: a foreigner (*believed to be Chinese) died in hospital in Village 4
column8: Sihanoukville.------The female victim was about 20-25 years old
column9: and was taken to hospital at 1.30 pm.------According to an autopsy
column10: it was concluded that victims died of a heart attack from over the counter medicines.------Currently
column11: the body is being kept at the hospital while her identity is being established.------Warning
